constantValues: Agreement to provide customer service during a specified amount of time or number of cases.

definitions.description: Agreement to provide customer service during a specified amount of time or number of cases.

members.name: contractId
members.description: Unique identifier of the contract.

members.name: emailAddress

constantValues: The primary email address for the entity.

members.description: The primary email address for the entity.

members.name: title

constantValues: Type a title or name for the contract that indicates the purpose of the contract.

members.description: Type a title or name for the contract that indicates the purpose of the contract.

members.name: activeOn

constantValues: Enter the date when the contract becomes active.

members.description: Enter the date when the contract becomes active.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: allotmentTypeCode

constantValues: Type of allotment that the contract supports.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'allotmentTypeCode_display' is added to the 'Contract' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'allotmentTypeCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: allotmentTypeCode_display

members.description: Type of allotment that the contract supports.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Select the customer account or contact to which the contract should be billed to provide a quick link to address and other customer details.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Select the customer account or contact to which the contract should be billed to provide a quick link to address and other customer details.

selectedTypeAttribute.name: idType

constantValues: The type of billing customer, either Account or Contact.

selectedTypeAttribute.description: The type of billing customer, either Account or Contact.

members.name: billingEndOn

constantValues: Enter the end date for the contract's billing period to indicate the period for which the customer must pay for a service.

members.description: Enter the end date for the contract's billing period to indicate the period for which the customer must pay for a service.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: billingFrequencyCode

constantValues: Select the billing schedule of the contract to indicate how often the customer should be invoiced.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'billingFrequencyCode_display' is added to the 'Contract' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'billingFrequencyCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: billingFrequencyCode_display

members.description: Select the billing schedule of the contract to indicate how often the customer should be invoiced.

members.name: billingStartOn

constantValues: Enter the start date for the contract's billing period to indicate the period for which the customer must pay for a service. This defaults to the same date that is selected in the Contract Start Date field.

members.description: Enter the start date for the contract's billing period to indicate the period for which the customer must pay for a service. This defaults to the same date that is selected in the Contract Start Date field.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: billToAddress

constantValues: Choose which address to send the invoice to.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose which address to send the invoice to.

members.name: cancelOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the contract was canceled.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the contract was canceled.

members.name: contractLanguage

constantValues: Type additional information about the contract, such as the products or services provided to the customer.

members.description: Type additional information about the contract, such as the products or services provided to the customer.

members.name: contractNumber

constantValues: Shows the number for the contract for customer reference and searching capabilities. You cannot modify this number.

members.description: Shows the number for the contract for customer reference and searching capabilities. You cannot modify this number.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: contractServiceLevelCode

constantValues: Select the level of service that should be provided for the contract based on your company's definition of bronze, silver, or gold.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'contractServiceLevelCode_display' is added to the 'Contract' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'contractServiceLevelCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: contractServiceLevelCode_display

members.description: Select the level of service that should be provided for the contract based on your company's definition of bronze, silver, or gold.

members.name: contractTemplateAbbreviation

constantValues: Shows the abbreviation of the contract template selected when the contract is created.

members.description: Shows the abbreviation of the contract template selected when the contract is created.

members.name: contractTemplateId

constantValues: Choose the contract template that should be used to determine the terms of the contract, such as allotment type, available hours, and billing frequency.

members.description: Choose the contract template that should be used to determine the terms of the contract, such as allotment type, available hours, and billing frequency.

members.name: duration

constantValues: Shows for the duration of the contract, in days, based on the contract start and end dates.

members.description: Shows for the duration of the contract, in days, based on the contract start and end dates.

members.name: effectivityCalendar

constantValues: Days of the week and times during which customer service support is available for the duration of the contract.

members.description: Days of the week and times during which customer service support is available for the duration of the contract.

members.name: expiresOn

constantValues: Enter the date when the contract expires.

members.description: Enter the date when the contract expires.

members.name: netPrice

constantValues: Shows the total charge to the customer for the service contract, calculated as the sum of values in the Net field for each existing contract line related to the contract.

members.description: Shows the total charge to the customer for the service contract, calculated as the sum of values in the Net field for each existing contract line related to the contract.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: netPriceBase

constantValues: Value of the Net Price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Net Price in base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: originatingContract

constantValues: Choose the original contract that this contract was created from. This information is used to track renewal history.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the original contract that this contract was created from. This information is used to track renewal history.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: serviceAddress

constantValues: Choose the address for the customer account or contact where the services are provided.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the address for the customer account or contact where the services are provided.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the contract is in draft, invoiced, active, on hold, canceled, or expired. You can edit only the contracts that are in draft status.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Contract' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the contract is in draft, invoiced, active, on hold, canceled, or expired. You can edit only the contracts that are in draft status.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Contract' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Select the contract's status.

members.name: totalDiscount

constantValues: Shows the total discount applied to the contract's service charges, calculated as the sum of values in the Discount fields for each existing contract line related to the contract.

members.description: Shows the total discount applied to the contract's service charges, calculated as the sum of values in the Discount fields for each existing contract line related to the contract.

members.name: totalDiscountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Discount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Discount in base currency.

members.name: totalPrice

constantValues: Shows the total service charge for the contract, before any discounts are credited. This is calculated as the sum of values in the Total Price field for each existing contract line related to the contract.

members.description: Shows the total service charge for the contract, before any discounts are credited. This is calculated as the sum of values in the Total Price field for each existing contract line related to the contract.

members.name: totalPriceBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Price in base currency.

members.name: useDiscountAsPercentage

constantValues: Select whether the discounts entered on contract lines for this contract should be entered as a percentage or a fixed dollar value.

members.description: Select whether the discounts entered on contract lines for this contract should be entered as a percentage or a fixed dollar value.

members.name: accountId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the account with which the contract is associated.

members.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the contract is associated.

members.name: billingAccountId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the account to which the contract is to be billed.

members.description: Unique identifier of the account to which the contract is to be billed.

members.name: billingContactId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the contact to whom the contract is to be billed.

members.description: Unique identifier of the contact to whom the contract is to be billed.

members.name: contactId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the contact specified for the contract.

members.description: Unique identifier of the contact specified for the contract.
